description: Incip. (after isnād): ... قال الحمد لله ... وقفت ادام الله توفىقك ... على ما سألت عنه من حدىث ام زرع ff. 19 (incompl. at end). 210 x 120; 170 x 83 mm. 19 lin. 13th cen. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 456 (no. 4).
author: ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá, 1083-1149
title: Bughyat al-rāʼid fīmā fī ḥadīth Umm Zarʻ min al-fawāʼid.
creator: ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá, 1083-1149
subject: Hadith—Commentaries—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
